title: Dragonstone bracelet

properties.value: Dragonstone bracelet is a piece of jewellery crafted by using a gold bar and a dragonstone at a furnace with a bracelet mould in their inventory at 74 Crafting, giving 110 experience. It can then be enchanted at 68 magic into a Combat bracelet. It is wielded in the hand slot of the player.

Item ID11115

Dragonstone bracelet is a piece of jewellery crafted by using a gold bar and a dragonstone at a furnace with a bracelet mould in their inventory at 74 Crafting, giving 110 experience. It can then be enchanted at 68 magic into a Combat bracelet. It is wielded in the hand slot of the player.

22 February 2018
